title: Marketable Securities Held, Year End, Large Manufacturing Corporations for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1914-1943 (2)--Original Data, 1920-1945 Coverage Is Based Upon 31 Corporations For 1914-1922; 46 For 1922-1925; 45 For 1925-1943 (See Lutz, P. 103). Rubber Companies Are Excluded. Source: Friedrich A. Lutz, "Corporate Cash Balances, 1914-1943, " Manufacturing And Trade, 1945, P. 114

This NBER data series a10042a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 10 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter10.html.

NBER Indicator: a10042a
